com.justai.zenbox.sdk.listener

Interface TextToSpeechListener


  • public interface TextToSpeechListener
    The TextToSpeechListener interface provides methods for managing the lifecycle of TextToSpeech. These methods will be invoked by TextToSpeech service on the main thread of your application.
    See Also:
    TextToSpeech, Utterance

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onUtteranceComplete(Utterance utterance)
      Called when TextToSpeech service has finished to synthesise an Utterance.
      void onUtteranceStart(Utterance utterance)
      Called when TextToSpeech service begins to synthesise an Utterance.

    • Method Detail

      • onUtteranceStart

        void onUtteranceStart(Utterance utterance)
        Called when TextToSpeech service begins to synthesise an Utterance.
        Parameters:
        utterance - an utterance to synthesise.

      • onUtteranceComplete

        void onUtteranceComplete(Utterance utterance)
        Called when TextToSpeech service has finished to synthesise an Utterance.
        Parameters:
        utterance - an utterance to synthesise.
